uncode_shortcode_id=”108834″]Staying healthy at Monson[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ override_padding=”yes” column_padding=”0″ style=”dark” top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”activities”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_height=”fontheight-golden-h2″ uncode_shortcode_id=”193553″]stimulating activities[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”103030″]Entertainment and activities for everyone

We have an ever-changing range of activities which reflects the interests and capabilities of our residents.

Our in-house activities co-ordinator ensures there is always something interesting and engaging for our residents to get involved in, whether it’s art clubs, exercise classes or a spot of gardening. We also offer trips out to explore the local area.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_gallery el_id=”gallery-741863″ type=”carousel” medias=”9901,9903,9904,9905,9906,9916″ carousel_lg=”1″ carousel_md=”1″ carousel_sm=”1″ thumb_size=”four-three” gutter_size=”3″ media_items=”media|lightbox|original” carousel_interval=”5000″ carousel_navspeed=”400″ carousel_loop=”yes” carousel_nav=”yes” carousel_nav_mobile=”yes” carousel_dots=”yes” carousel_dots_mobile=”yes” stage_padding=”0″ single_overlay_opacity=”50″ single_padding=”2″ uncode_shortcode_id=”498766″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section back_color=”color-lxmt” overlay_alpha=”50″][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”3″ bottom_padding=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”facilities”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”9471″ media_width_percent=”100″ shadow=”yes” shadow_weight=”sm” uncode_shortcode_id=”543762″][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_height=”fontheight-golden-h2″ uncode_shortcode_id=”303700″]amazing facilities[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text text_lead=”yes” uncode_shortcode_id=”316087″]Purpose-built home with a range of facilities to suit your every need. Each bedroom at Monson is spacious, fully equipped and has been tastefully decorated.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”h6″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_space=”fontspace-154403″ uncode_shortcode_id=”114550″]Events and Activities in our home and in Lincoln[/vc_custom_heading][vc_row_inner limit_content=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][uncode_list uncode_shortcode_id=”211613″]

  • All bedrooms have en-suite facilities and High-speed internet so you can stay connected with loved ones. If you prefer something more relaxing, we have a specialist bath with a powered seat transfer
  • Socialise with friends We have a number of lounges, perfect for socializing with friends, over a game of cards, a board game, or simply to have a chat

[/uncode_list][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][uncode_list uncode_shortcode_id=”859575″]

  • Our air-conditioned lounges have smart TVs and views out to the garden and for those who want some quiet time, we have a library where you can sit back and read a book
  • Your privacy is important to us, that’s why we have a dedicated clinical room that facilitates our attending doctor, district nurses, chiropodist, dentist and optician.

[/uncode_list][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section overlay_alpha=”50″][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”food-nutrition”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_height=”fontheight-golden-h2″ uncode_shortcode_id=”202936″]food & nutrition[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”764432″]At Monson, we place great emphasis on providing our residents with fresh and nutritious food.

The home sources quality ingredients which are lovingly prepared by our in-house team each day.

There is a varied and ever-changing menu, from salads and something light in spring/summer to hearty, comforting meals in winter. We strive to accommodate any special dietary requirements, or any particular likes or dislikes.

Drinks, tea and snacks (including delicious, home-baked cakes) are served throughout the day and are available on request.

Meals are served in our dining room, where full table service is provided; for those who want to dine in the peace & quiet of their own room, room service is always available.

Relatives are always welcome to dine with their loved ones; just let us know you’re coming and our staff team will be happy to accommodate you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”9500″ media_width_percent=”100″ alignment=”right” shadow=”yes” shadow_weight=”sm” advanced=”yes” media_overlay_color=”color-glenda-grad-bottom” media_overlay_opacity=”100″ media_overlay_visible=”yes” media_text_visible=”yes” media_overlay_anim=”no” media_text_anim=”no” media_image_anim=”no” media_h_align=”center” media_v_position=”bottom” media_padding=”2″ uncode_shortcode_id=”169752″ media_overlay_color_type=”uncode-palette”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section][vc_row][vc_column column_width_percent=”80″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″ uncode_shortcode_id=”314921″][vc_custom_heading text_height=”fontheight-golden-h2″ uncode_shortcode_id=”185918″]what’s been happening at Monson care home[/vc_custom_heading][uncode_index el_id=”index-317115″ isotope_mode=”fitRows” loop=”size:3|order_by:date|order:DESC|post_type:post|categories:12|taxonomy_count:10″ gutter_size=”3″ post_items=”media|featured|onpost|original,title,link|default|default_size” screen_lg=”1000″ screen_md=”600″ screen_sm=”480″ images_size=”one-one” single_overlay_opacity=”50″ single_padding=”2″ single_title_semantic=”h2″ single_title_family=”font-golden” single_title_dimension=”fontsize-golden-h3″ single_title_space=”fontspace-347181″ uncode_shortcode_id=”171966″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
